translation: And whatever is the seed of all beings, that too am I, O Arjuna; there is no being, be it moving or unmoving, that can exist without Me.
commentary: 10.39 that which? f and? Even also? among all beings? seed seed? That that? I'm I? Arjuna Or Arjuna? Not not? That that? Is there is? Without without? that which? Maybe may be? Maya by Me? Being the past? moving or unmoving the moving and unmoving.Commentary I am the primeval seed from which all creation has come into existence. I am the seed of everything. I am the Self of everything. Nothing can exist without Me. Everything is of My nature. I am the essence of everything. Without Me all things would be mere void. I am the soul of everything.
